pages.text: The $(item)Compost Bin$() converts organic material and water into $(item)Mulch$().

$(info) To remove $(item)Mulch$(), $(use) with a $(thing)Shovel$().$(p)$(info) The $(item)Compost Bin$() will work faster when it has more active compost in it.$(p)$(info) Moisture in the form of $(item)Water$() is required for the device to function.
